source: BIM ThinkSpace Episode 28 (Measuring and Improving Adaptive Maturity)

Agility.question: Does your organisation reallocate resources during disruptions?
Agility.action: Reallocate resources promptly to sustain operations during disruptions

Agility.question: Are reallocations guided by documented prioritisation rules?
Agility.action: Establish and apply prioritisation rules for reallocating resources

Agility.question: Do workflows adapt when market or regulatory requirements shift?
Agility.action: Review and update workflows regularly to reflect new requirements

Agility.question: Are workflow updates coordinated across business units?
Agility.action: Coordinate workflow updates across all relevant business units

Agility.question: Can operational decisions be taken without escalation?
Agility.action: Delegate authority to managers to accelerate operational decisions

Agility.question: Are delegated rights formally reviewed?
Agility.action: Review and adjust delegated authority regularly

Agility.question: Does leadership encourage experimentation with new ideas?
Agility.action: Conduct pilot projects to test and refine new ideas

Agility.question: Does the organisation adopt digital tools quickly?
Agility.action: Implement digital tools within six months of identification

Agility.question: Do teams redesign practices after disruptions?
Agility.action: Empower teams to redesign practices in response to disruptions

Agility.question: Are risks reviewed before pivoting to new approaches?
Agility.action: Conduct structured risk–opportunity reviews before pivots

Agility.question: Do cross-functional teams coordinate rapid responses?
Agility.action: Form cross-functional teams to coordinate rapid responses to disruptions

Agility.question: Is agility monitored as part of performance management?
Agility.action: Monitor agility indicators within the performance management system

Resilience.question: Does your organisation have continuity plans?
Resilience.action: Develop continuity plans to respond to performance disruptions

Resilience.question: Are continuity plans tested regularly?
Resilience.action: Test continuity plans through annual simulations

Resilience.question: Are continuity plans updated after each disruption or test?
Resilience.action: Update continuity plans systematically after disruptions or tests

Resilience.question: Does your organisation maintain reserves of critical resources?
Resilience.action: Maintain a three-month reserve of critical resources to accommodate unforeseen disruptions

Resilience.question: Are suppliers diversified to mitigate risks?
Resilience.action: Source key inputs from at least three independent suppliers

Resilience.question: Does your organisation maintain redundancy in digital systems?
Resilience.action: Maintain mirrored cloud environments across two regions

Resilience.question: Do you measure recovery times from major disruptions?
Resilience.action: Achieve operational recovery within 48 hours of critical system failure

Resilience.question: Are risk assessments integrated into planning processes?
Resilience.action: Integrate structured risk assessments into strategic and operational planning

Resilience.question: Are staff trained in emergency protocols?
Resilience.action: Train staff annually in emergency response protocols

Resilience.question: Are resilience metrics tracked at the executive level?
Resilience.action: Track resilience metrics at executive level reporting dashboards

Resilience.question: Do business units share lessons from past disruptions?
Resilience.action: Share lessons from disruptions across business units through structured reports

Vitality.question: Do you measure staff morale regularly?
Vitality.action: Conduct quarterly staff morale surveys with participation exceeding 70%

Vitality.question: Are wellbeing initiatives available for employees?
Vitality.action: Provide weekly wellbeing activities accessible to all staff

Vitality.question: Does your organisation channel staff creativity into innovation?
Vitality.action: Conduct structured workshops to encourage innovation at regular periods

Vitality.question: Are innovation outcomes captured and shared organisation-wide?
Vitality.action: Document and disseminate innovation outcomes across the organisation

Vitality.question: Do you monitor burnout indicators?
Vitality.action: Track absence and sick leave rates annually to identify vitality risks

Vitality.question: Are employees motivated to join adaptive initiatives?
Vitality.action: Maintain volunteer pools for rapid-response initiatives

Vitality.question: Do you recognise adaptive energy among teams?
Vitality.action: Incentivise teams that demonstrate adaptive energy through recognition schemes

Vitality.question: Do leaders promote vitality programmes?
Vitality.action: Promote vitality programmes consistently at leadership level

Vitality.question: Are vitality initiatives aligned with organisational goals?
Vitality.action: Align vitality programmes with organisational strategic objectives

Vitality.question: Do staff have access to professional development?
Vitality.action: Provide continuous professional development to sustain adaptive vitality

Culture.question: Are adaptability and learning part of organisational values?
Culture.action: Embed adaptability and learning into organisational value statements

Culture.question: Is knowledge sharing actively encouraged?
Culture.action: Provide open-access repositories and encourage staff to contribute knowledge

Culture.question: Is cross-departmental collaboration supported?
Culture.action: Incentivise cross-departmental collaboration through rewards and recognition

Culture.question: Does your organisation treat failure as a learning opportunity?
Culture.action: Publish lessons-learned briefs after each project or disruption

Culture.question: Are cultural barriers to change actively removed?
Culture.action: Update organisational policies annually to eliminate outdated practices

Culture.question: Do leaders role-model adaptive culture?
Culture.action: Demonstrate adaptive behaviours consistently at leadership level

Culture.question: Does your organisation recognise champions of change?
Culture.action: Incentivise individual champions who promote adaptive change

Culture.question: Are shared norms reinforced through rituals or routines?
Culture.action: Reinforce adaptive norms through organisational rituals and routines

Culture.question: Is diversity considered a strength in adaptive practices?
Culture.action: Integrate diversity principles into adaptive practices

Culture.question: Do teams celebrate successful adaptations?
Culture.action: Celebrate adaptive successes through public recognition events

Culture.question: Is learning from disruptions embedded culturally?
Culture.action: Embed post-disruption learning into organisational culture statements

Maturity.question: Are core processes documented?
Maturity.action: Document all core processes in a central repository

Maturity.question: Are documented processes updated regularly?
Maturity.action: Update process documentation annually or after major changes

Maturity.question: Are responsibilities and accountabilities clearly defined?
Maturity.action: Define role descriptions with clear accountabilities

Maturity.question: Are workflows integrated across departments?
Maturity.action: Align at least 80% of workflows across business units

Maturity.question: Does your organisation conduct regular audits of processes?
Maturity.action: Conduct structured process audits at least twice annually

Maturity.question: Are improvements systematically identified?
Maturity.action: Identify opportunities for continuous improvement through audits and reviews

Maturity.question: Do processes incorporate risk–opportunity analysis?
Maturity.action: Integrate risk–opportunity reviews into process improvement cycles

Maturity.question: Are process changes communicated effectively?
Maturity.action: Communicate process changes promptly to all relevant stakeholders

Maturity.question: Are maturity levels benchmarked against standards?
Maturity.action: Benchmark organisational maturity against relevant standards and peers

Maturity.question: Do improvement initiatives extend across the organisation?
Maturity.action: Implement improvement initiatives across multiple organisational units

Maturity.question: Is maturity progress tracked over time?
Maturity.action: Track and report maturity improvements on an annual basis
